description: This list contains information on changes in status to Street Hail Livery Drivers and their corresponding record history starting from 09/18/2014 (inclusive). The most recently published active Street Hail Livery Drivers list can be found at https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Transportation/Street-Hail-Livery-Drivers-Active/5tub-eh45
